details.text: The first thing users see when navigating to galactica.com
Depending on the route we take, the URL will probably be galactica.com, currently:
app.serious-debauchery.click
Classic about page
Classic pricing page
Classic contact page
Classic sign up form
Classic sign in form
Classic forgot password flow (built in a step-by-step wizard style)

items: User enters their email and clicks continue (step 1)
User enters the OTP received in email in the OTP input and clicks continue (step 2)
User enters the new password (2 times) and clicks change password (step 3)
User is redirected to the sign in page (step 4)

details.text: Classic email verification flow
Classic email confirmation
Classic not found error page
Classic unauthorized error page
Classic user onboarding flow (step-by-step wizard)

items: Welcome page with next steps explanation, where user can skip or continue (step 1)
Basic profile info, like a profile photo and the title. Here user can also go back (step 2)
Some other basic profile info, like bio and the user's mission (step 3)
Some additional info, like website, location (city, country) and the user's social media (step 4)
Success tab, with options to continue onboarding (not yet implemented), go back, or go directly to dashboard (step 5)
There is one more tab which says that the onboarding is already completed, and it redirects in 10 seconds to dashboard

details.text: This is the main page a user with role INSTRUCTOR/TEACHER/CREATOR is redirected
Depending on the route we take, the URL will probably be app.galactica.com, currently:
app.serious-debauchery.click/dashboard
Here they have a navbar/sidenav specific to them, with products, sales info, marketing, and routing to all the pages specific to their role
Usually here the user has their basic info regarding everything, like best products, highest sales, etc.
A page seen only by users with role INSTRUCTOR/TEACHER/CREATOR
Here they can manage their created products, see details about customers, sales, etc. for each one, edit them, and create new ones
This is the page specifically for creating new products
The flow chosen follows best practices for this situation, but the UX needs improvements (too many buttons, too many clicks)
This is the page specifically for editing existing products
Technically it's still the same component as creating a product, but with parameters in the URL
User's storefront page
Can edit themes, colors, items, information
The settings created in this page will be used for the creators real storefront (seen by customers)
User's sale information page
Here they can see details about purchases, can edit prices, can see analytics and sale trends
User's marketing page
Here they can see their marketing campaigns, can create new ones, can edit existing ones, and can see analytics
Also reviews from customers are shown here
This is also a hub for communication (messages, live sessions)
This is the page seen by users with role STUDENT/BUYER/CUSTOMER
Depending on the route we take, the URL will probably be app.galactica.com, currently:
app.serious-debauchery.click/app-home
This is the creator's main hub, with a navbar with a search bar, link to course, cart, and notification
Here they can search for courses, products, or creators
Here they can see their most recently started courses, and other categories of products tailored to the user's preferences
